title: Complete Task Response
description: This is the response you would get from sending a patch request to /api/tasks/{task_id}/toggle-complete?api_token={users_token}.

user_id.description: The id of the user assigned to this task.

parent_id.description: The id of the parent task for this task. If this is not a sub-task, it will be null.

completed_at.description: The date of completion for this task in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format. If you are marking the task incomplete, this will be null.

created_at.description: The date that this task was created in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

updated_at.description: The date that this task was last updated in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.
